website_summaries.verdict: A reliable pair of wireless headphones.
pros: Excellent battery and dependable bluetooth function
Foldable design makes them easy to carry around
cons: The weak build of these headphones can cause them to break

customer_reviews.title: Cost-effective replacement for Beats
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my Beats that got stolen. They're not as light weight, and the strap that sits on top of my head isn't as comfortable. However, the swivel earphones are genius! My ears stick out more than normal people's ears so these fit quite comfortably for longer compared to other earphones. They're wonderful quality. They are noise canceling, which helps me focus at work when I need to shut out the other office noises. They are a great price and I love the sound quality. I love that they can be bluetooth or wired. I would defnitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Left ear will stop working eventually.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset in March 2018 and five months later the left ear stopped working and the whole headset won’t charge all the way. The red light just diseappears (no more blue light).
customer_reviews.author: little miss moonlight

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: Luv these headphones. Glad I didn’t get into the HYPE of “beats” and other more expensive brands. Works well for just regular music listening and running.
customer_reviews.author: NemesisNash

customer_reviews.title: Best $80 I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: WOW... for $80 I literally cannot believe the sound quality coming from these headphones. Super crisp highs and nice deep lows. I listen to a lot of dubstep and these hit the bass notes extremely well, very comparable to Beats Solo 2's but at an even better price point. Paired via Bluetooth immediately right out of the box, super easy to operate with the on-ear controls. They don't tout "noise canceling" capabilities but with music playing, I can't hear anything going on around me. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Derek D.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap compared to more expensive alternatives with similar sound quality. Accurate battery life. The headphones also fold up for safe storage. My only gripe with these is that they must be toggled off and on if you didn't have your phone Bluetooth enabled first. If they don't detect your phone on power up they will never connect to it. Also the volume works kind of weird. Pressing the power buttons rasies the volume on your device, making it seem like the headphones are at maximum volume when the phone says max. However the volume can keep going up higher still, but it would be hard to know unless you kept pressing them. Great product otherwise, perfect for the gym!
customer_reviews.author: senorencurtido

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! It is just what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! It is just what I was looking for. Connects great to musiv via my IPhone. Speakers are fantastic; totally blocks out any noise so I don't hear my breathing when exercising. I would definitely reccommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gina E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. Have great sound and are comfortable to wear. Recommend them to all.
customer_reviews.author: Alexbuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Cheap Design
customer_reviews.text: I give these headphones 3 stars because the sound quality and battery life are amazing, but the quality of the headphones themselves leave a lot to be desired. Luckily I bought a warranty. I have had to send these headphones back to the manufacturer for replacement, twice now. The plastic housing around the headpiece adjustment has broken, in the exact same spot, twice, on two separate headsets. I believe it’s a design flaw central to this model, as this has happened spontaneously on two separate items, in the exact same place each time. I wish they were designed better, because if they were, they’d be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bournecb

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted three months of light use! Won’t turn on, gets hot when charging. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t overthink it
customer_reviews.text: I used to own beats headphones and honestly, I couldn’t tell the difference between the two. I use these everyday at the gym and have had no problems with them. I’m not a musician in a studio. It sounds the same to me. They’re lightweight, the price was good, and they do everything I need them to do. Don’t overthink it. This is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jamesbinga

customer_reviews.title: Big sound you say?!? Blown away!
customer_reviews.text: Big sound! I feel like that old memorex commercial were the guy is blown back in a seat from explosive sound! All around great set for $40 bucks, just not sure if these were used resealed and sold as new because they normally go for $69 on sale. Worth it for the quality and sound you get! These JBLs blow away uproar wireless and hesh 2 by the candy company. Love the optional wired headphone jack so I’m not concerned with getting 16hours of battery life. No regrets at all! Grab a set on sale, you won’t be disappointed. The only thing missing is a case or bag, other than that these rock!
customer_reviews.author: Frankly

customer_reviews.title: Issue with battery charging only lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted four months. Online searching indicates there's an issue where the headphones overheat when you use a high power charger. I charged them after having them only four months didn't notice they were hot but then my headphones never turned back on again. Loved them while they worked but only lasted four months. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul_Seattle

customer_reviews.title: It’s very generic in every aspect
customer_reviews.text: The material feels cheap and light. It’s part plastic and part mesh cloth. So if you sweat, it’s gonna stay on it and stink. Sound qualitywise, it’s like the Beats solo 1. It doesn’t cover your entire ears and the sound is just loud but not refined. The bluetooth pairs easily. Regarding the buttons, they are placed awkwardly and might need some getting used-to.
customer_reviews.author: pons

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot and can recommend them but if you love bass this isn't for U.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice looking and link up quick and ez and sound pretty good not too bass heavy, kind of an equal across the board sound. They look great. Kind of tight though is my only complaint if I had one. Buy teal it will show dirt but they look great on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Call me KID

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW - GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: These headphones lastest 14 months! That's it! JBL Headphones which leads me to believe these are knock-off headphones. They were great for the past 12 months, 3 months ago started having issues with them not synching. Not turning on. Now they do nothing. Contacted the seller and they told me, too bad. Amazon sold them. No, your the seller, you selling crap products. Buyer Beware. Save you money, buy authentic headphones directly from the JBL or Dr Dre or Beats website. Otherwise you will just be throwing your item away within one year.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only used these headphones for a month and they have quit working. Power dosent stay on. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphone and high quality for the price. I love the comfort on my ears and neck. Sound quality is good. The headphones are not for a larger person. I bought this pair for my husband because I already bought one. He didn't like how snug it was so we bought the blue headphone for him which is the next level in the same family. And now I have two pairs of these great headphones. I recommend them and also buy a case to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Great until they werent
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked great for about a month, then the ear pieces got really weird and discolored. After about 3 months they stopped charging or holding a charge. The red light will light up for about 5 minutes, but no more blue light to show they are fully charged, and now they can't even connect to bluetooth. Very frustrating for headphones at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as beats
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the sound quality of these headphones. I listen to them at work and they are pretty loud and that's how I prefer to listen to my music. Even though the sound quality is good I can't listen with them turn up to the max for an extended period of time. the bass is more than efficient but the only drawback is that I wouldn't recommend wearing them while running, the audio gets weird. These headphones offer a lot of value though
customer_reviews.author: Wall E McFly

customer_reviews.title: Stopped turning on.
customer_reviews.text: ONE YEAR OLD REVIEw. DO NOT BUY Trash the wires are all busted. My husband is an electrical engineer. He took apart and the entire set or wires are broken and ripped in too many places Stopped working. Pretty crappy now. Don’t waste your money. As you see my first review was a good. They just didn’t last long. I only wore doing house chores while baby slept this is my first pair of on ear head phones and my husband is already jealous! These are amazing headphones. Sound is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3R’s

customer_reviews.title: I would be happy to change my review after we get the problem ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. We set everything up they way the instructions said, but we cannot get them to charge or play music even while they are plugged in. Is there someone we could talk to to help troubleshoot or get a replacement? I would be happy to change my review after we get the problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for under $100
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace an older (different brand) pair that broke. Initially everything seems good, the look decent, sound good and the price was right. Will work fine for my use, which is movies and music. My only concern is durability, I treated the last pair good, but after about 18 months they broke. So if these last a few years, well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Honestly disappointed given the sound quality an the overall look of ...
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of JBLs. My first pair were E55BT which after about 8 months of use broke. The power switch no longer works. Bought these (E45BT) on accident (meant to buy E55BT) which is my fault and not the issue I had. Within 2 months these also had the same issue with the power switch. Honestly disappointed given the sound quality an the overall look of the product which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mertz

customer_reviews.title: lasted about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The were great until they broke, all of about 3 months. The charging cable stopped illuminating the charging light, then presumably the battery died and they won't turn on anymore. Tried different charging cables, seemingly a problem within the device.
customer_reviews.author: David Reno

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these headphones. They are nice and sleek they do not stick up off of your head and the sound is good. I could not ware them for longer than 10 minutes because they hurt my ears so bad. I tried four different times and I just couldn’t stand it. They just crushed my ears to the point it hurt to touch them even after I took them off.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones ever! I been using them for over a month now to work out and they are great! They don’t try and fall off like some did in the past when I jog or do jump rope. I work out in a tennis court that’s got a cage around it and literally right next to it they are developing more ground in our neighborhood and I can’t even hear the construction site as I work out and they do their job. No issues with the batteries either. Overall I’m very satisfied with my product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and I can carry it with me everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It’s foldable and bluetooth. Works perfect with my iPhone 7. Long life battery.
customer_reviews.author: maralaura

customer_reviews.title: would not turn on
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful when I bought these. I have some JBL bluetooth speakers I really like. these seemed like middle of the road price and quality wise. I received them and the power switch did not slide on. There is clearly horrible quality control. directions were hard to read and vague. JBL should be ashamed of itself. Can't comment on sound quality or battery life as I could not turn them on!!
customer_reviews.author: Primeshopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones, they are comfortable and adjust perfectly to my head and ears. The sound quality is good for me and they are easy to pack away into my backpack for work or school. They charge very quickly as well. I have been using them for a few months now and they haven't given me any problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: MELANIE MEOWS

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift and Sound
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift to a friend of my wife's daughter for Christmas (long story). I got them on sale for a terrific price and from what I have heard, she has not taken them off. I own a couple of JBL speakers and bluetooth devices and I love the warm, rich sound. Looks like I am not the only one.
customer_reviews.author: Smoker65

customer_reviews.title: Cable (for wired use) apparently broken and non standard
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter, while on BT they work as expected, but using the provided cable you can only hear the left side and considerably low. Thought of getting a new cable as it might be broken, buy being a non starndard cable (3.5 on one end, the other thiner) couldn"t find a replacement, so starting the return process.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good sound
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and the sound is very good. I like that they can be plugged-in and used without bluetooth. They are not great for exercise. They are okay as long as I am in a upright position but slip if I am laying on the floor or on a bench.
customer_reviews.author: Wishwasbiking

customer_reviews.title: I Love Them- Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these headphones for almost a year now and I still love and use them. The only thing that is "messed up" is that the material on the ear cushion is starting to wear off, but that should happen since I use them everyday! Overall they are definitely worth the purchase, and they are louder than my friend's Beat headphones that she has.
customer_reviews.author: Keyana

customer_reviews.title: A great headphone
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed some noise cancelling blue tooth cans while she paints and I read the reviews of these and got my wife a pair. she absolutely loves them, can walk around the house listening to her music and when she goes to her studio and finds them t be very comfortable. I have not used them so I can't attest but my wife is very objective.
customer_reviews.author: charles adelmann

customer_reviews.title: Trim is a bit weak
customer_reviews.text: They work fine but the trim on the headband seems to be a bit weak, I've bought 2 sets of these and the plastic trim seems to crack and snap in the same place. It doesn't seem to be much of an issue but as I bought them for 2 different people I assume it's a weakness in the product rather than something they were doing.
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones. You can’t beat the price. The sound quality is amazing & they feel like quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J Paterson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BUT
customer_reviews.text: Overall the headset is just fine as is. Sound great nice construction so far. For me why I won't keep these is because in the gym the fall off your head if you lean forward or backwards. This is because the ear pieces pivot sideways which is allowing the ear piece to roll forward pull the band off your head.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Work solidly after 6 months or so. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good for the price as far as on ear wireless headphones go. Made of quality componets however the only issue I had personally was the Bluetooth switch somehow got stuck and pushed down. Was able to fix it. It happened a week in to owning it. Other than that they work great. Sound quality isn’t on the same level as beats, Bose, jabra but they rank right below those types.
customer_reviews.author: Leon C.

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can use the Bluetooth or hard wire headphone jack...headphones can feel tight for large head(.I wouldn't recommend them)...over all sound for me is about a 8...I use them to watch movies and tv ...for music they are just ok a 6...If you like heavy bass these are not the headphones for you...I use these headphones everyday since I got them.
customer_reviews.author: davbetty

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is great, all you could expect from a JBL
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, all you could expect from a JBL. Bluetooth connection is flawless, great range support, very easy and fast to pair. Very comfortable on my ears. Four stars, not five, to the fact that the headphones don’t feel soooo secure on my head while I’m at the gym. I have to hold it while doing some movements that require lowering my head, like a simple bending to grab a bar on the floor, etc. But on the treadmill, elliptical, bikes, or lifting weights without having to lower my head, no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Paulo Fraga

customer_reviews.title: Love these wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: They sound incredible while blocking out surrounding noise. They are comfortable and connects immediately to my Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sheeny

customer_reviews.title: Not the best sound, but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'd give the sound quality a 3.5, but one thing I love about these is that you can sync them with multiple devices. I has a button on the headset to cycle between connections. They're pretty comfortable, but I can't wear them for more than an hour or two before I need to take a break.
customer_reviews.author: Art Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones for price.
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones, but they didn’t last long. I can walk around my house and the signal goes through walls. I have never had these headphones disconnect or breakup. I got these for my birthday and have had them for a few weeks and love them! The music is so freakin clear. Cable did short out and left headphone blew out within 6 months
customer_reviews.author: TheLaserShowKid

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile or design flaw?
customer_reviews.text: The message below was written by my son Téo. He bought the headphones using my account and asks me to post his note below: To whom it may concern, In April 2019 I bought JBL E45BT headphones through Amazon and as of June they were already irreparably broken due to a design flaw, despite it being carefully cared for. I do not think you should allow this product to be sold on Amazon and if possible I would like a refund. Yours sincerely, Téo Flandoli O'Keefe teo@irmaosgemeos.com - using my Mom's Amazon Prime Account (Fernanda Flandoli)
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Flandoli

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the expectations at such peice point.
customer_reviews.text: Not so impressive for a 90 usd headphones. My other headphones sony mdr-10rbt beats it in sound and build quality and also in comfort wearing on the ear. And it's 15 usd cheaper. I was just trying another brand for my kids, will return. Don't recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I always loved the JBL brand and this headphones confirms why
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 11yr due to cost as the primary factor. Since she has an Alesis drum kit, I wanted something comfortable that fit well to her size. Once she began wearing them - there was no taking them off. So now she wears them while drumming, dancing through the house, studying, and of course tripping over things as she walks. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: KgArthr

customer_reviews.title: Battery drain problem and poor warranty response from JBL (Harman)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased JBL E45BT headphones for use during gym workouts. Although the overall quality and sound are good, the battery appears to drain while the power switch is in the OFF position, and I typically get only 2 to 3 hours of actual use between recharges. Further, getting return and replacement from JBL/Harman is proving very frustrating and I certainly do not recommend the company as it does not appear to back up its products under warranty in a consumer-friendly way.
customer_reviews.author: David Dufurrena

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for a new pair of headphones, he's had Beats, Skull Candy and an array of others over the years. These were the winners and at a much lower price! I was incredibly surprised as he's picky (as we all are) when it comes to things we use so often. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Sizer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two pairs of headsets like these. This particular pair has lasted longer in getting loose around the head. Eventually, this type of headphones will become loose and hard to keep on your head if you use them to work out. Otherwise, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for about three weeks and I really like them. They don't cut out like some of the others I've had. The bass isn't as good as I would like but the overall sound is good. If the bass was a little better I would give them five stars but they are good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Super long battery life charge once don’t worry about it All day
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I bought for our family, our kids use them continuously it seems like, we had replaced beats headphones which we liked but always had a problem with one side going out. Super durable, great sound price and shipping
customer_reviews.author: Maria C

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5months
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted about 5months : ( First one ear stopped working. Then the other went. Yes they were dropped on the floor a few times but very disappointed that for that price they didn't last long. We used them about 2 hours a day so maybe that's why they wore out that quickly. They had great sound quality and noise blocking.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Blankenbiller

customer_reviews.title: Great battery, great brand, good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great because they are relatively cheap for jbl and they keep up there reputation of good sound quality the battery lasts for almost a week and it charges in an hour with the provided charger the only gripe is that the material is kinda poor but no durability issues after a month of use
customer_reviews.author: N!x m!x

customer_reviews.title: The left side of the blue pair stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed and wish that I had paid close attention and read all the reviews about these headphones not working. I bought three pairs of these headphones as Christmas gifts for my kids. I have 2 black pair and one blue pair. The black ones are fine and I hope they stay that way. The left side of the blue pair stopped working last month. Clearly there is some kind of defect in these headphones and I hope that JBL takes care of this problem. We as customers pay too much for these headphones for them to stop working after a few months of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mayers

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and good sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life and good sound for the money. Easy sync to my iPhone 6s and MacBook Pro. no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: A. Montero

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones for excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and fantastic sound quality for wireless. I prefer sound that is not so bass heavy because it tends to be too muffled so for like-minded listeners this headset offers great sound clarity. Only drawback is that I wish these were foldable, or at least have a bag to carry them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice headphones updated
customer_reviews.text: headphones are perfect except they are pretty tight and make my ears sore after a couple of hours. Otherwise great headset update to review - 3/22/2020 headphones no longer will charge or turn on. Not too happy with short life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars, Edit down to 3, it worked well but now the bluetooth functionality no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, good connection. Feels good. Could be a little less bulky. Edit: Almost 2 years later, the headphones no longer connect to Bluetooth. It turns on but then stays on. Is unresponsive and works sporadically.
customer_reviews.author: ljot

customer_reviews.title: Best Mom Ever
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old said " Mom these are lit" when opening them and sent a picture to his "bro's" with fire emojis. He is either planning on lighting them on fire or they are "fire".How can one really keep up with the slang in today's youth. Cant be to sure, but they are still in one piece with not melted plastic or burn marks and he has had them for some time before this review was written.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn!

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable for extended use.
customer_reviews.text: I know not everyone has the same ear or head shape but after wearing these for more than an hour studying or working they really begin to hurt my ears. Quality of sound and bluetooth capabilities are great for the price though
customer_reviews.author: T. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not Mac compatible
customer_reviews.text: No bass, low maximum volume and compatibility is almost non-existent with MacBook Pro a1706. The headphone jack adapter also didn’t work at all, and wasn’t even listed in the instructions on how to use it. These are probably worth $40 less than they’re sold for. Which is a shame because JBL usually does a good job on value
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M.

customer_reviews.title: Jbl
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself and my walking/ jogging excursions back in Jan. I love them and take very good care of them a little piece of the headphone label thingy cracked then broke. But that doesn’t determine my overall outlook on them
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love these wireless headphones! Battery life is amazing and the price was very reasonable. Love the fact that they don’t cover my entire ear. I use them when I have to fly for travel and am now afraid my wife is eyeballing them and May prefer them over here!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Q. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for occasional-normal use!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with my JBL’s! I don’t use them as much as I would like but when I do they perform really well. I don’t use the Bluetooth very often. I usually just plug them in to my iPod/iPhone but I’ve had no problems at all. I was gonna by just regular corded headphones but I got these instead because the cord can be replaced. Headphones that have an attached cord eventually fail because cords will break either at the plug or up by the ear piece. With these, if that happens I can just order a new cord or use the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Esparza

customer_reviews.title: If they kick the bucket don't expect good warranty service
customer_reviews.text: I received the unit about a month ago. It worked fine until about a week ago. Then the left earphone started cutting out and now doesn't even produce sound. I am about to leave for study abroad so naturally I want headphones but JBl support told me that the only way to get them to me was for me to pay shipping to England once they send my parents the fixed headphones. The rep was very kind but there was so many options to remedy the situation that they were not willing to do. Therefore I will not be buying from JBL ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Aarrestad

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have ever bought. Great sound and comfortable. I bought my father a pair for christmas, I waited for price to come down and bought this pair for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Needed something to keep noise out because I wear them on the lawn mower. They don't silence the lawnmower but the music plays well enough to make it enjoyable. Without the noise of the lawn mower these sound great! They are easy to use and I really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Richards

customer_reviews.title: JBL!  It's the Best!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I use them to listen to my Google Fire for Audibles! Fix nice with good stereo sound! I have 3 of these E45BT. Red, Aqua and white!! JBL has always made a good product. I'm a long time user of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy C. Harcrow

customer_reviews.title: Good....for the first 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these headphone. The first 4 months i had the headphones they were great, however they are slowly falling apart. The left ear speaker is fading, and the newest issus is the the headphones randomly shut off; even after a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it except as you can see from the picture, it's already broken. The item was delivered on Jan 14, 2019 and this happened on Jan 18, 2019. My son that he picked it up from his bed and it was loose. The headphones are free from any sign of physical damage/abuse. There has to be a replacement or return policy especially when I read about the same defects from previous users; but I took a gamble because I hoped it would happen maybe a year from now and I'll just buy him another.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm always worried about buying headphones, the good ones cost a lot. In this price range these are good quality headphones, great sound and very comfortable. I can't use them for running though. They rock though for all other uses!!!
customer_reviews.author: OneGirlsOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sux!
customer_reviews.text: Had the headphones less than a month and headphones only hold charge for less than 1hr. Use them in the gym. So a 2hr workouts you without tunes for 1hr which sucks. Headphones also are not snug. Sound quality is good but battery life is terrible. Especially for the head phones to be less than a month old.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend enough. Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Used for over a year working construction and they last forever between charges, the sound is great and they are strong. The only issue may be that the beats brains may tell you how theirs are better... but who cares
customer_reviews.author: JS Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: When I bought them : Sounds good, BT coonection could be better in the city, battery life is good. After 4 months later : Headphones not working, probably cable is cut down by normal using. Headphone has no reaction to my try to turn it on. I have to return headphones for repair. I was expecting better quality from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Krajcik

customer_reviews.title: Falls off of your head
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are not a great buy. The sound quality is okay until about 50% when you start to hear static. These headphones are also very uncomfortable around the ears and head. Having said this, they also fall off of your head. I bought these with the intent to work out in them, and it is impossible to do this as they will not stay on. Overall I rate the headphones poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Dye wearing off on ear
customer_reviews.text: It has not been a year since my son got these. My son was loving these and one day he came home to have both ears dye in blue. I tried wiping it down and the dye continues to wear off on his skin. I was almost loving these but I'm not sure what happen here. unfortunately it gave JBL a bad reputation because I would never buy anything this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Bernice DeLaRosa

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone for the value...when it decides to be turned on
customer_reviews.text: After a good 12 months, the headphone decides to misbehave. It takes several tries of sliding the power button to ON in order to really power on this headphone. The headphone still works well, when I'm able to turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Al Chew

customer_reviews.title: Punches above its weight
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality... These headphones have a near perfect EQ. The mids, highs, vocals, and lows are all crystal clear at any range. If you forget to charge them or prefer even higher quality sound, they come with an RF Jack. I kind of worry about the henges I do not think they are durable, but at this price point, you are getting a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: SavyestShopper

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I love the color great design but I lost connection 5 times at the gym the Bluetooth kept kicking the headphones out! So I’m not sure if it was a phone issue or a headphone issue. But it drove me crazy! I am going to give them another try!
customer_reviews.author: David647

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this purchase. These headphones have not lasted at all. Malfunctioning no more than two months after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: 1555 Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Left Ear stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones until about a year passed after I bought them. After just normal use, no dropping or smashing, all of a sudden the left earphone stopped working and I read other reviews that said the same thing. JBL, get your stuff together cause this is a problem. Would NOT recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Pitts

customer_reviews.title: First set of wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great. I use them at home all the time and so far no problems. I have had them for about 3 months now and they are still holding up great and holding a long charge. If you have never had wireless headphones and want good quality and sound.... these are the ones 4 U.
customer_reviews.author: Madhungarian

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones LESS than 2 months ago. A month and a half in and they have stopped coming on!! I have tried charging it to no avail. Previous to that, the music would consistantly be cutting off and coming back on while I listened. The sound quality of these headphones are excellent, but they clearly have a lot of issue refurbishing them. I saw a previous review about this happening to someone else and I still took the chance and lost out
customer_reviews.author: Raeann Clement

customer_reviews.title: JBL Does It Again
customer_reviews.text: Best $80 I have ever spent on headphones. I wouldn’t expect this type of quality if I spent $150. The build is light but strong. The sound is beautiful from highs to lows. I have a large head (7 3/4 hat size) and these fit comfortably. First day I bought them I listened to them for 8 hours straight with no discomfort. I love the portability of these headphones since they fold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: BLINQ seller does not provide any support; go find another seller to purchase from
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April of this year and the product has stopped turning on completely. Contacted seller and they're taking no responsibility. If you want to purchase this product, go with a different seller that actually backs their sales.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Works good as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not a high end headphone but works great for what they are and what I wanted. Light weight and generally small is what I was looking for to listen to music or The Ticket on my morning walks. Battery life seems very good so far too.
customer_reviews.author: Murfazon

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Fast charge, quality, long charge cord, excellent sound, high volume, excellent noise canceling for an on the ear, connects fast, folds up, survives drops, well rounded sound, fantastic for gaming! (Yes, you can use the white IPhone charge block with a changing cable that comes with the headphones)
customer_reviews.author: Jason Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I like these wireless headphones. The one thing I don’t like about it is they don’t have low range bass at all. Overall, I’m happy w/ the product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality at higher volumes
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t very satisfied with the sound quality from these headphones. Week one the sound quality seemed decent and then At 70-80% volume the static and high end rattle started coming through. Was afraid I might blow them just by turning them all the way up. You need about 50% or lower volume to experience a decent sound. Durability and battery life was great. Had these for More than a couple months and charged my headphones twice
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. My first wireless headphones and I love them. I have other JBL products and they live up to their name. I researched other brands but it just felt safer sticking with JBL. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is a piece of trash. Right side auricular stopped working after one month. I had bose, sony, beats and even headphones from the $5 dollar store and something like this never happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E. Fraija

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection quality
customer_reviews.text: I used these headphones exclusively for the gym. They were decent at first and now about a month in, it struggles to keep a connection. Constantly the music stutters because of connection issue although my phone is in arms reach. Literally, if my arm come straight in between my phone and the headphones it begins to stutter because of the poor connection quality. Honestly, do not recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not enough bass, I expected for much more from JBL for that price. I do like the BT range and quick response, feels like this device connects better with my iPhone 8 than others, this is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Adi R

customer_reviews.title: JBL wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the gym so I don’t have to listen to what they are playing. The battery charge lasts forever. I can listen to my own playlist.
customer_reviews.author: greta#1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: I experimented with a similar priced audio technica product as well as some $200-$300 sonys. The JBL e45bt sounds better than all of them. It is super comfortable even with THICK GLASSES. One feature I could do without: it plays a deafening warning sound during the last hour of battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kabler

customer_reviews.title: Headphone sets that works well...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it and I am planning to purchase one for myself white.
customer_reviews.author: Kazi Hamidullah

customer_reviews.title: Sound good.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. Not as good as Bose or beats or high quality Sony. Probably just less bass. High end sounds fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer752519

customer_reviews.title: No complaints from my son.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones for my 16 yo son and I’ve heard nothing but good things about these. Thinking about buying some for myself. The other day he told me he hasn’t charged them in 4 days and the battery was still at 70% and that he can’t really hear any outside noise. “The WiFi range is impressive as well” he said.
customer_reviews.author: Mom on a budget

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 5/14/19, today is ONLY 7/28/19 and my headphones R ear has stopped working. Can not return due to the "past 30 days" rule. VERY disappointed an VERY upset. I use them everyday at the gym. And for a headphone at this price to break is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Garner

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven’t had very long, bought for my husband. He likes them and we got on sale so that’s even better. Was looking at beats but didn’t want to pay the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,452 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
